OH.content: heading of the other: first condition of an identity that is not an egocentrism destructive of oneself and the other, not even anti-heading or decapitation
double bind, injunction divides us > guardians of a European idea that cares for what is other than it, the other heading, the heading of the other
call to betray a certain order of capital is taking place now, in an act of memory faithful to the other heading

PS.content: Artaud howls under headings: existence, flesh, life, theater, cruelty > promising an art prior to madness & work

O.content: effect of dissemination: lose one’s head, not know where it is
